subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The surprise starter Sergei Bobrovsky stopped 29 shots in his first N.H.L. game, and the Flyers spoiled the Penguins’ opening night in their new arena.
snippet: The surprise starter Sergei Bobrovsky stopped 29 shots in his first N.H.L. game, and the Flyers spoiled the Penguins’ opening night in their new arena.
